name: HOMERUN (Lee Hammoud)
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a house?

Well in this game, you are a house!

Move your HOUSE with THE ARROW KEYS

Get to the End, the end is really really close. Like, 2 mins close.

The trucks are trying to bulldoze you. Avoid them

Hide in swimmming pools, but don't hide in there for too long or you'll drown, as a house.

Drowning. As a HOUSE. Pretty realistic eh

By Lee Hammoud, Ahmad Al Arabi, Jalal Achkar. We made this game for the 2019 Global GameJam. We spent working on this game, like 10 hours, combined.
